attributes.action: hand this petition to the Queen, along with the request that Parliament be dissolved and an election called immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, are calling for Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth 2nd to dissolve parliament, in accordance with the rights afforded her by the Queens Prerogative powers.

The current Labour government's incompetence is something which can and should not be suffered any longer. Over the past twelve years the British people have grown tired and become ever more frustrated as this Labour government has dismantled the economy, stolen our most basic rights, cheapened our sovereignty and surrendered our borders in the most outrageous act of treason this country has ever witnessed.

We, the British people, are demanding an end to the failure and moral destruction that is the hallmark of the Labour Government; and as such we demand that this government be dissolved so that we, the British people, can elect a new government with the best interests of this country to heart.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
